title: Chaos druid

properties.name: description
properties.value: Chaos druids are low-level humans commonly killed for their frequent drops of herbs. Unlike most druids, they worship both Guthix and Zamorak. They attack with their fists and make use of a spell that appears to be a combination of the Confuse and Bind spells, binding their target very briefly if successful.

Monster ID520

Chaos druids are low-level humans commonly killed for their frequent drops of herbs. Unlike most druids, they worship both Guthix and Zamorak. They attack with their fists and make use of a spell that appears to be a combination of the Confuse and Bind spells, binding their target very briefly if successful.

Players who decide to kill Chaos Druids in Edgeville Dungeon should beware of player killers who disguise themselves in Zamorak robes to take on the appearance of a Chaos Druid. If you attack another player you will become skulled and potentially lose all of your items.
